name: Pho Bo (Beef Noodles)
description: Fragrant rice noodle soup with tender beef slices, simmered in a star anise and cinnamon broth, served with fresh herbs, bean sprouts, and lime.

name: Banh Mi Thit (Pork Sandwich)
description: Crusty baguette filled with pork, pâté, pickled carrots, daikon, cucumber, cilantro, and a dash of chili sauce.

name: Che Ba Mau (Three-Color Dessert)
description: Layered dessert of red beans, mung beans, and pandan jelly, topped with coconut milk and served chilled.

name: Goi Cuon (Fresh Spring Rolls)
description: Rice paper rolls filled with shrimp, pork, rice vermicelli, lettuce, and herbs, served with peanut dipping sauce.

name: Bun Cha (Grilled Pork Noodles)
description: Grilled pork patties and pork belly with rice vermicelli, fresh herbs, and tangy fish sauce dipping broth.

name: Rau Muong Xao Toi (Stir-fried Water Spinach)
description: Crunchy morning glory stir-fried with garlic, offering a simple yet savory flavor.

name: Banh Xeo (Crispy Pancake)
description: Crispy rice flour pancake filled with shrimp, pork, bean sprouts, and mung beans, served with herbs and fish sauce.

name: Cha Gio (Fried Spring Rolls)
description: Crispy fried rolls with pork, shrimp, and vegetables, served with tangy fish sauce dip.

name: Banh Cuon (Steamed Rice Rolls)
description: Steamed rice flour rolls filled with minced pork, wood ear mushrooms, and shallots, topped with fried onions.

name: Ca Phe Trung (Egg Coffee)
description: Creamy coffee topped with whipped egg yolk and condensed milk, served warm or chilled.

name: Bun Bo Hue (Spicy Beef Noodles)
description: Spicy beef noodle soup with lemongrass, pork knuckles, and blood pudding, garnished with herbs.

name: Com Tam (Broken Rice Plate)
description: Broken rice served with grilled pork chop, pickled vegetables, and a fried egg, with fish sauce on the side.

name: Che Dau Trang (Black-Eyed Pea Dessert)
description: Sweet black-eyed pea pudding with sticky rice and coconut milk, served chilled.

name: Goi Ngo Sen (Lotus Stem Salad)
description: Crunchy lotus stem salad with shrimp, pork, herbs, and roasted peanuts, dressed in fish sauce.

name: Banh Chung (Sticky Rice Cake)
description: Glutinous rice cake filled with pork and mung bean, wrapped in banana leaves, traditionally steamed for hours.

name: Nom Hoa Chuoi (Banana Blossom Salad)
description: Shredded banana blossom mixed with herbs, peanuts, and a tangy vegan dressing.

name: Banh Bot Loc (Tapioca Dumplings)
description: Translucent tapioca dumplings filled with shrimp and pork, served with fish sauce and chili.

name: Ca Kho To (Caramelized Fish)
description: Fish braised in a clay pot with caramel sauce, black pepper, and shallots, served with rice.

name: Che Bap (Corn Pudding)
description: Sweet corn and sticky rice dessert topped with coconut cream and sesame seeds.

name: Cha Ca La Vong (Turmeric Fish)
description: Grilled fish marinated in turmeric and dill, served with rice noodles, herbs, and peanuts.

name: Banh Beo (Steamed Rice Cakes)
description: Tiny steamed rice cakes topped with ground shrimp, scallions, and fried shallots, served with fish sauce.

name: Dau Phu Nuoc Duong (Tofu Pudding)
description: Silky tofu pudding served with sweet ginger syrup and coconut milk.

name: Canh Chua (Sour Soup)
description: Tangy tamarind-based soup with fish, pineapple, tomatoes, and herbs, often served with rice.

name: Dau Phu Sot Ca (Tofu in Tomato Sauce)
description: Fried tofu simmered in a rich tomato sauce with onions and herbs.

name: Banh Khoai (Hue Pancake)
description: Crispy pancake filled with shrimp, pork, and bean sprouts, served with peanut sauce.

name: Xoi Ga (Sticky Rice with Chicken)
description: Glutinous rice topped with shredded chicken, fried shallots, and a side of chili sauce.

name: Banh Da Lon (Layered Sticky Cake)
description: Layered sticky rice cake with pandan and mung bean, steamed and slightly sweet.

name: Nem Chua (Fermented Pork Roll)
description: Spicy, tangy fermented pork rolls wrapped in banana leaves, served as a snack.

name: Goi Du Du (Papaya Salad)
description: Shredded green papaya with dried beef, herbs, and a spicy fish sauce dressing.

name: Banh It Tran (Sticky Rice Dumplings)
description: Glutinous rice dumplings filled with mung bean and shrimp, served with fish sauce.
